tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE forums ( 
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    title STRING, 
    description STRING, 
    created_at TIMESTAMP, 
    num_posts INT 
)

CREATE TABLE discussions (
    discussion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
    email VARCHAR(255),
    password VARCHAR(100),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    discussion_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    content TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (discussion_id) REFERENCES discussions(discussion_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    post_content TEXT,
    posted_by INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (posted_by) REFERENCES Students(student_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    comment_content TEXT NOT NULL,
    post_id INT,
    commented_by INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (commented_by) REFERENCES Students(student_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Likes (
    like_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    liked_by INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (post_id) REFERENCES Posts(post_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (liked_by) REFERENCES Students(student_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    post_content TEXT NOT NULL,
    post_author_id INT NOT NULL,
    post_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

CREATE TABLE Comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    comment_content TEXT NOT NULL,
    comment_author_id INT NOT NULL,
    comment_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    post_id INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Likes (
    like_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT NOT NULL,
    comment_id INT NOT NULL,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    like_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);
